creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two panels; top panel:  9-3/4" embroidered panel made up of three squares; white on blue cross stitch surrounded by embroidered band on three sides; fourth side plain blue; further surrounded by applique in red, white, dark blue and light blue; other panel:  geometric 1" bands of cross stitch, white on blue, surround center rectangle
title: Baby Carrier
